name: Dungeon At The End Of The World
name_original: Dungeon At The End Of The World
description:
Dungeon At the End of the World is part one of a short Dungeon Crawling RPG. Designed around collecting a small party of adventurers and using their skills to find your way to the end of the dungeon and discover how you got there, and maybe find a way out. 

Part 1 contains a portion of the Dungeon, as well as the first Guardian, a fearsome elemental boss that must be defeated to progress through the dungeon. 

Use WASD to move around the dungeon, you can adjust the camera with the scroll wheel and rotate around your character by right clicking and dragging. 

In battle, use your skills to defeat your enemies. Mana is recovered by attacking and doing damage, so don't be afraid to be aggressive. You can access descriptions of the skills available in part one using the main menu of the game, as well as by pressing escape in game and selecting "How to Play"
